typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
source(output(
		PK_COVERAGE_GROUP as double,
		COVERAGE_CODE as string,
		COVERAGE_DESC as string,
		EXPOSURE_GROUP_CODE as string,
		EXPOSURE_GROUP_DESC as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		SORT_ORDER as double,
		WAR_INDICATOR as string,
		ENERGY_EXP_GROUP_DESC as string,
		ENERGY_EXP_GROUP_CODE as string,
		LAYER_GROUP_DESCR as string,
		LAYER_GROUP_CODE as string,
		GIC_GROUP_CODE as string,
		GIC_GROUP_DESC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CoverageGroup
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 122) ~> FilterCodeTypeIDEquals122
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == -3) ~> FilterCodeTypeIDEqualsMinus3
ChangeToCoverageNames, ChangeToPrdNames join(ChangeToCoverageNames@COVERAGE_SOURCE_CODE == ChangeToPrdNames@COVERAGE_SOURCE_CODE
	&& ChangeToCoverageNames@SOURCE_SYSTEM == ChangeToPrdNames@SOURCE_SYSTEM,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinPrdGroups
FilterCodeTypeIDEqualsMinus3 select(mapColumn(
		COVERAGE_SOURCE_CODE = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		PRD_GROUP_TARGET_CODE = TARGET_CODE,
		PRD_GROUP_TARGET_DESCR = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ChangeToPrdNames
FilterCodeTypeIDEquals122 select(mapColumn(
		COVERAGE_SOURCE_CODE = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		COVERAGE_TARGET_CODE = TARGET_CODE,
		COVERAGE_TARGET_DESCR = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		CODE_TYPE_ID,
		CODE2,
		OM_X_REF
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ChangeToCoverageNames
JoinPrdGroups derive(PRD_GROUP_TARGET_CODE = case(isNull(PRD_GROUP_TARGET_CODE),'N/A', PRD_GROUP_TARGET_CODE),
		PRD_GROUP_TARGET_DESCR = case(isNull(PRD_GROUP_TARGET_DESCR), 'Not Applicable', PRD_GROUP_TARGET_DESCR)) ~> SetNotAppliacable
RemoveUnusedColumns aggregate(groupBy(COVERAGE_TARGET_CODE),
	each(match(name !='COVERAGE_TARGET_CODE'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Deduplicate
SetNotAppliacable select(mapColumn(
		COVERAGE_TARGET_CODE,
		COVERAGE_TARGET_DESCR,
		CODE2,
		PRD_GROUP_TARGET_CODE,
		PRD_GROUP_TARGET_DESCR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnusedColumns
Deduplicate, CoverageGroup lookup(COVERAGE_TARGET_CODE == COVERAGE_CODE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupCoverageGroup
LookupCoverageGroup filter(isMatch()) ~> FilterMatchedRows
FilterMatchedRows select(mapColumn(
		PK_KEY = COVERAGE_TARGET_CODE,
		COV_DESCRIPTION = COVERAGE_TARGET_DESCR,
		COV_EXPOSURE_GROUP_CODE = EXPOSURE_GROUP_CODE,
		COV_EXPOSURE_GROUP_DESC = EXPOSURE_GROUP_DESC,
		GRP_CODE = PRD_GROUP_TARGET_CODE,
		GRP_DESCR = PRD_GROUP_TARGET_DESCR,
		COV_ENERGY_EXP_GROUP_CODE = ENERGY_EXP_GROUP_CODE,
		COV_ENERGY_EXP_GROUP_DESC = ENERGY_EXP_GROUP_DESC,
		COV_LAYER_GROUP_CODE = LAYER_GROUP_CODE,
		COV_LAYER_GROUP_DESCR = LAYER_GROUP_DESCR,
		COV_GIC_GROUP_CODE = GIC_GROUP_CODE,
		COV_GIC_GROUP_DESC = GIC_GROUP_DESC,
		COV_3LTR_CODE = CODE2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutColumns
